IP_SYN_4_var_8: The patient presented for evaluation of a right upper lobe nodule. We employed electromagnetic navigation to guide a catheter into the anterior segment of the RUL. Localization was confirmed with radial EBUS, displaying a concentric view. We performed needle aspirations, which showed lymphocytes on rapid evaluation, followed by forceps biopsies. Final fluoroscopic inspection confirmed the absence of a pneumothorax.
